dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const title = document.querySelector('.gh-editor-title')?.value || ''; const tags = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#tag-input .ember-power-select-multiple-option')).map(el => el.textContent.trim().replace(/\s*x$/, '')); return (title === 'My First Post' && tags.includes('Tech')) ? 'True' : 'False'; })()

dom_match.dom_extractor: (() => { const label = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('label')).find(l => l.innerText.trim().includes('Full name')); if (!label) return null; const input = document.getElementById(label.getAttribute('for')) || label.querySelector('input') || label.parentElement.querySelector('input'); return input ? input.value : null; })()
dom_match.description: Verify new name is present in the input field.
